site_name: Leighton House Museum, 12 Holland Park Road, LONDON, W14 8LZ
description: Details required by condition 6a (submission and written approval by local planning authority of method statements in respect of means of removal and reinstatement of existing roof to Perrin wing, [including 1:5 section and elevation detail through high windows] before relevant part of work is begun) of listed building consent 19/07621 (Extensions and alterations to include removal of infill development below Winter Studio; replacement of fire escape with new stair and lift enclosure; creation of mezzanine floor and accessible entrance in Perrin Wing; excavation of basement to accommodate new drawings gallery, collections store and WC facilities, and new glazed links to house)
